This place is one of my favourite places I visited. The staff were crazy friendly and had loads of decent crack. The downstairs is like a cocktail bar with live music and has a wicked atmosphere. They have mixologists which create drinks that you wouldn't of dreamed of. Upstairs is more of a pub and they have a nice outside seating area. Not much food wise and for me personally seemed like a fairly restricted menu, but overall a top quality experience. Recommended
